about_the_game:
2 Characters
3 Levels
4 Bosses
5 is also a number
15 Abilities
18 Enemies
1 Grandma out for Revenge



Berry Hunt Survivors is a Reverse-Bullet-Hell Game with Rogue-lite elements. Choose your character, defeat enemies, learn new abilities and destroy the big bosses!

All Grandma wanted to do was make her delicious jam, but the evil Francis & Felice sent their heinous monsters to steal the fruits of her hard work. Now, she‘s out for revenge!



Play as grandma or grandpa and take back what's yours! Choose from many different active and passive abilities to defeat the onslaught of enemies. Collect berries to level up and get new abilities. Collect gold to permanently upgrade your skills between games. Fight your way thorugh the hordes of evil and beat the challenging bossfights to unlock new levels and characters!

Tip
All active abilities get a special, very strong upgrade once you level them to level 5!

Tip
Dentures are a very save but also strong starting ability. Since they have no cooldown they deal damage almost all the time, especially if there are lots of enemies on the screen. They are also largely independent of your position giving you the chance to concentrate on running away and collecting gold and exp berries!

Tip
You can reroll the abilities in the level up screen by pressing the dice on the right! You can also press R on the keyboard, or the X button on an Xbox Controller, or the Square button on a PlayStation controller. The first reroll is free, but it gets more and more expensive from there.

Tip
Some abilities have scaling. Icebolts for example scale with ice kills. They are weak early on but can become really strong if you get enough kills with (other) ice abilities. On their own they won‘t scale much, so make sure you have at least one other ice ability. But don‘t get Icebolts too late either, because then they won‘t have time to scale!

Tip
Your chances of getting certain types of abilities are higher if you already have one or more of that type. If you want the Firebolt it might be a good idea to skill the Firepillar so you‘ll have a higher chance of getting it in the level up screen!

Tip
Mimics are special enemies, they are rare and spawn randomly. They are tough to fight, but drop a lot of gold, so keep an eye out for them!

Tip
You can play with keyboard, mouse and controller! Use W, A, S, D, the arrow keys or the left stick on your controller to move around and traverse the menus. You can bring up the Pause Menu with ESC or the Start button on your controller.
